Maya是Arbitrum上最顶尖的发射平台项目！: Maya, the top Launchpad project on Arbitrum!
Maya是一个去中心化的Coinlist发射平台，旨在改变用户发现新项目和使项目: Maya is the premier launchpad project, like Coinlist but decentralized, created to transform how users discover new projects and enable project owners/teams to launch their projects and tokens with ease. Our goal is to simplify the project launching process while offering a secure, user-friendly, and efficient platform for both creators and investors.
通过简单直观的布局，使新用户和有经验的用户都可以轻松浏览和启动项目。: Navigating the platform is a breeze, with a straightforward layout that makes it easy for both new and experienced users to explore and launch projects.
Maya提供多种设置新项目的方式和模板。您可以选择拍卖您的代币，以固定价格分发代: Maya offers multiple ways and templates for setting up a new project. You can choose to auction your token, distribute them at a fixed price, or dynamically set up a token claim.
Maya将拥有自己的本地代币，其功能类似于$BNB。使用Maya的项目越多，Ma: Maya will have its own native token, which will function similarly to $BNB. The more projects that use Maya, the more valuable the Maya token becomes.
本地代币的质押者将享有对所有在Maya上启动的项目的平等分配权，为参与提供额外的: Stakers of the native token will enjoy equal distribution rights to all projects launching on Maya, providing an additional incentive for participation.
加入我们，一起在Arbitrum上重塑项目启动的格局，使用Maya，最终的去中心: Join us on this exciting journey as we reshape the project launching landscape with Maya, the ultimate decentralized launchpad on Arbitrum!
我们很高兴与您分享这个旅程，希望您为这些令人兴奋的即将到来的事件做好: We're excited to share this journey with you, and we hope you'll mark your calendars for these exciting upcoming events!
我们很高兴地宣布，Maya Launchpad平台将上线，为用户创造一个发现令人: We are excited to announce the official launch of Maya, the top Launchpad project on Arbitrum!
Maya将拥有自己的本地代币，其功能类似于$BNB。使用Maya的项目越多，Ma: Maya will have its own native token that functions like $BNB. The more projects that use Maya, the higher the value of Maya tokens.
我们通过本地Maya代币的预售，为早期支持者提供参与和从平台增长中受益的机会。: We're offering early supporters a chance to participate and benefit from the platform's growth through the presale of the native Maya token.
Maya代币的公开销售将开始，面向所有有兴趣的参与者开放。: The public sale of the Maya token will begin, open to all interested participants.
代币质押将启用，为代币质押者提供对Maya上启动的所有项目的平等分配权。: Token staking will be enabled, granting stakers equal distribution rights to all projects launching on Maya.
第一个项目将在Maya平台上启动，这是我们旅程中的一个重要里程碑。: The first project will be launched on the Maya platform, marking a major milestone in our journey.
我们将继续通过添加新功能、改善用户体验并整合我们不断壮大的社区的反馈来改进和扩展: We will continue to improve and expand the Maya platform by adding new features, refining the user experience, and integrating feedback from our growing community.
我们的目标是简化项目启动过程，同时为创作者和投资者提供一个安全、用户友好和高效的: Our goal is to simplify the project launching process while offering a secure, user-friendly, and efficient platform for both creators and investors.
